1.content:
You can't remember what happened. It was all a blur then you wake up in a strange grassland like area. You can't make out any of your surroundings but you can tell that your nowhere near your home. The only thing you can think is how you got here.

You were about to ask your self when the ground started to shake, it shakes so much you fell back on your butt. Then a shadow appears behind you and you see a giant foot, it was encased in a black boot. Looking up you see a beautiful lady with horns on here head, a gold and pink crown, razor sharp teeth smiling at you, a green shell on her back, four spiked bracelets on her wrist and arm, a beautiful black dress and her knee high boots

"Hello there what is your name" she says smiling at you
"Um m-my name is y-y/n, a-and who are you" you asked frighten of the girl
"My name is bowsette"
"D-do you know w-w-where I am"
"That's not important, I brought you here"
"W-why"
"Because I want to have some fun"
1.title: Arriving

12.content: do you want ass or farts
12.title: Butt/fart

14.content: How does she eat you though?
14.title: Vore/soft vore
